pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Inference for the Birnbaum-Saunders Distribution // Developed for the following tasks. 1- Simulating and computing the maximum likelihood estimator for the Birnbaum-Saunders (BS) distribution, 2- Computing the Bayesian estimator for the parameters of the BS distribution based on reference prior proposed by Xu and Tang (2010) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2009.08.004 and conjugate prior. 3- Computing the Bayesian estimator for the BS distribution based on conjugate prior. 4- Computing the Bayesian estimator for the BS distribution based on Jeffrey prior given by Achcar (1993) doi:10.1016/0167-9473(93)90170-X 5- Computing the Bayesian estimator for the BS distribution under progressive type-II censoring scheme.
